scripts.build:rollup: pulp build -- --source-maps && rollup --config && yarn run uglify:rollup
scripts.build:webpack: pulp build -- --source-maps && webpack && yarn run uglify:webpack
scripts.build:psc-bundle: pulp build --main Main --optimise --to dist/js/psc-bundle.js && yarn run uglify:psc-bundle
scripts.build:pulp-browserify: pulp browserify --main Main --optimise --to dist/js/pulp-browserify.js && yarn run uglify:pulp-browserify
